Selected Answer: CD
- License metric: results for each license metric associated to the software model. License metric rights allocations are calculated for:
o Allocated in use: software license that is allocated and used to license installations.
o Not allocated in use: software license that is used to license installations but not allocated.
o Allocated not in use: software license that is allocated but not used to license installations.
o Not allocated: number of available rights that have not been allocated (installed or not)
o Allocations needed: number of allocations needed for compliance (only used for Per Named User and Per Named Device license metrics)
